metadata.description: This sample demonstrates the use of animation interpolators and path animations for `Material Design`.
metadata.intro:
Material design is a comprehensive guide for visual, motion, and interaction design across platforms and devices. Starting with API level 21, [Android includes support for material design][1] apps.
This sample demonstrates the use of `Material Design` animation interpolators and path animations. It uses an [ObjectAnimator][2] to animate two view properties, `Scale_X` and `Scale_Y`. Users can pick from a set of interpolator options. They can also define the duration of the animation.
[1]: https://developer.android.com/training/material/index.html [2]: https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/graphics/prop-animation.html#object-animator
